description: Ignore the limited mediocre reviews and focus on the positives, an extremely rare to find rural boozer focusing on drinks with a cobwebby display of antiques and ephemera to enjoy, served by the characterful landlord 'The Hat'. (Added January 2022)

name: The Man of Kent
description:
City: Little Mill
description: A hybrid between a casual ale house/café and traditional black beamed Inn, very well reviewed but a visit will confirm if it's really guide worthy. (Added January 2023)

name: Little Gem
description:
City: Aylesford
description: Small, rustic ale house with exposed rafters, timber beams hanging hops and genteel surroundings. Exceptional reviews, looks pretty good. (Added January 2023)

name: Hospůdka U TŘÍ SEKYREK
description:
City: Prague
description: It has been a while since a Mala Strana option came along that interested us, but this seems like a good operation. A green glazed tile bar counter with painting behind the bar, simple seating in an intimate space that resemble cellar vaults. Reviews near uniformly positive. Could be worth a look. (added January 2023)

name: Rodinný pivovar Cestář
description:
City: Ostruzna
description: Beautiful log cabin/chalet with mini-brewery and airy wood strip conservatory room for tastings and relaxing. Very well reviewed (Added January 2023)

name: Smugglers Ale House
description:
City: Robin Hood's Bay
description: Cosy looking intimate ale house, modernised but tastefully done with a warm hue. (Added January 2023)

name: Bar Bodega José
description:
City: Blanes
description: A long standing worn-in boozer with  large fireplace, red painted ceiling and chintzy nautical theme (of course) blended with saloon bar vibes. Very well reviewed and as a cult venue looks worth a try in the area. (added January 2023)

name: The Kirk Inn
description:
City: Romaldkirk
description: One of the last few wet-led pubs in hamlets run seemingly almost for the sheer hell of it, with all the homespun charm and eccentricity that involves - and unreliable opening hours. Good luck! (Added January 2023)

name: Spinners Arms
description:
City: Cummersdale
description: Pleasant looking village pub with distinctive exterior, homely interior and communal layout with several ales available. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2023)

name: Sun Inn
description:
City: Clun
description: One of those historic pubs that has become a famous destination. There can be some trappings associated with those, but all the same, the bar area looks reasonably authentic and unspoilt with a distinctively genteel rustic fitting. (Added January 2023)

name: Sir Sydney Smith
description:
City: London
description: While subject to some redecoration this small boozer looks promising inside and out, good reviews may hint at something more too.  (added January 2023)

name: The Bon Accord
description:
City: Glasgow
description: Whisky and ale specialists, terrific reviews. The pub itself is traditional, perhaps a little bland in places so we will take a closer look before deciding. (Added January 2023)

name: Bar L'Aviso
description:
City: St Malo
description: Cocktail bar with brooding red lights and wood fitting, not fully refurbished or pretentious, a deal of worn-in charm to enjoy, seemingly as the good reviews attest to. (Added January 2023)

name: The Golden Cup Inn
description:
City: Hanley
description: Refurbishment of a heritage pub with gleaming Victoriana tiles and wood fitting, seemingly with a focus on retaining the comfort and colours too. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2023)

name: The Blind Monkey
description:
City: Sheffield
description: An unusual recreation of a traditional pub within a more craft focused ale house. Compact with nooks and crannies - looks worth a try! (Added January 2023)

name: Pauwel Kwak Bierhuis
description:
City: Prague
description: Not Czech, but good reviews of this Belgian bar are nevertheless intriguing. (Added January 2023)

name: MANNALA PILS
description:
City: Colmar
description: Popular, well reviewed beer specialists with light hued wood, warm colours and social vibe. (added January 2023)

name: Bodega del Born
description:
City: Barcelona
description: Fun, funky and colourful. Well reviewed Bodega churning out classics but with a stylistic twist of its own. (Added January 2023)

name: Děčínská bouda
description:
City: Pec pod Snezkou
description: Cosy mountain hut/ Krcma style affair with chunky varnished wood, hearty meals, fireplace and countryside vibes. Very positive reviews. (Added January 2023)

name: Spinnrad - Berliner Kneipe
description:
City: Berlin
description: Truly excellent looking warm cosy, unspoilt Kneipe. Personalised and wood fit, great reviews. Authenticity is conveyed. (Added January 2023)

name: Hostinec
description:
City: Veselicko
description: Famous old Czech pub with a mechanical music player - featured on Tales of Old Pubs on Czech television. (Added January 2023)

name: Pension Hamerská krčma Jonáš
description:
City: Svobodne Hamri
description: Purposefully rustic, almost dreamlike rural Krcma as featured on Tales of Old Pubs on Czech television. (Added January 2023)

name: The Driftwood Spars
description:
City: Trevaunance Cove
description: Interesting little pub/brewing operation with a traditional yet personalised interior. Worth a look. Added January 2023)

name: Seven Stars Inn
description:
City: Stithians
description: Well reviewed traditional pub with a community feel to it, looks worth a try. (Added February 2023)

name: The Fat Cat & Canary
description:
City: Norwich
description: Another Fat Cat in the city, this one also an appealing homely pub with curved glazed windows, pub ephemera and a scheme of creams and reds. Real ales of course and live music. Very well reviewed. (Added February 2023)

name: Hemingway
description:
City: Cluj-Napoca
description: The best looking cocktail bar in town, which has some modern touches but a hint of the speakeasy sleaze which can improve the atmosphere a notch. Very well Reviewed (Added February 2023)

name: TABANCO EL PASAJE -VINOS y FLAMENCO-
description:
City: Jerez
description: Classic sherry bar with barrels, tiled floor and walls. Flamenco performances. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2023)

name: The Ship Inn
description:
City: Hull
description: Good write-ups in local press, run by a local councillor who also cooks the food. Some decent drinks options but otherwise a backstreet booze. May be worth trying one time. (Added February 2023)

name: The Hare On The Hill
description:
City: Bristol
description: Cosy personalised corner pub with a wide range of drinks, well reviewed and a community feel. Has to be worth a try. (Added February 2023)

name: pub Kavárka
description:
City: Brno
description: Classic unspoilt down-to-earth Czech pajzl. Great reviews. Looks like Poutnik on tap, occasional live music. No airs and graces and not a new wave pub at all. (Added February 2023)

name: Newfield Inn
description:
City: Seathwaite
description: Cosy traditional inn, stone cottage with wood-fit bar and fireplace, excellent reviews. (Added February 2023)

name: The Strands Hotel / Inn & Micro Brewery
description:
City: Nether Wasdale
description: Hotel, micro-brewery and inn with an attractive stripped back simple, homely appearance inside, very well reviewed, looks well worth visiting. (added February 2023)

name: The Orange Tree
description:
City: Kirkby Lonsdale
description: Freehouse and hotel with a tidy traditional pub. Perhaps slightly tarted up for day-trippers it has still retained its core appeal for now, so it seems. (Added February 2023)

name: The Wellington Inn & Caravan Park
description:
City: Great Orton
description: A simple traditional country inn with exposed beams, red carpet and chunky furniture. Set up to serve hikers and caravan holidayers. Looks no-nonsense and fairy ungentrified. (Added February 2023)

name: Punch Bowl Inn Pub
description:
City: Great Broughton
description: A community pub staffed by volunteers - check opening hours carefully and maybe call ahead. A homely living room type interior and excellent reviews. Must be worth a try the one time. (Added February 2023)

name: Fox & Pheasant Inn
description:
City: Armathwaite
description: Attractive rural pub in a stone cottage with dark wood fittings, exposed stone. Some dining element to it but with a dartboard and pubby looking bar it should have a balance still.  Well reviewed (Added February 2023)

name: Hostinec u Olinka
description:
City: Lhotka
description: As featured on series Tales of Old Pubs on Czech television. A dressy appearance is deceiving, you will find a down to earth social pub with a musical connection here. Looks good, reviews are exceptional. (added February 2023)

name: Old Black Bull Raskelf
description:
City: Raskelf
description: Very nice looking country pub with a Theakston tie, traditional homely interior with a classic appearance of blackened beams, cream walls, fireplace. Music nights. Very well reviewed. (Added February 2023)

name: The Old Star
description:
City: Kilham
description: Unspoilt country pub with reassuringly chunky wood fittings and cosy interior. Very well reviewed. (Added February 2023)

name: The Bridge Inn
description:
City: Ruswarp
description: Impressive wood fit interior with upholstered bench seating. Despite the exterior it appears to have retained its unspoilt appearance. CAMRA listed and good reviews. (Added February 2023)

name: Arconti 31 Pub
description:
City: Gallarate
description: English style pub with varnished brown wood panels, multiple beers on tap. May possibly have a cask line too! (Added February 2023)

name: Taberna Casa Manteca
description:
City: Cadiz
description: Unmissable traditional taberna with a homely feel. Exposed beams, tiling, dozens of framed photos and artwork, classic format. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2023)

name: La Fresquita
description:
City: Seville
description: Traditional tapas bar decorated with religious iconography. Seems to be worth a look when in the area. (Added March 2023)

name: Taberna del Dragón Verde
description:
City: Seville
description: Lavish, possibly silly bar with large wooden fittings and mythological theme. Very good reviews so perhaps worth a try. (Added March 2023)

name: Bodeguita La Chicotá
description:
City: Sevilla
description: Wild card - authentic working class Bodeguita, snack bar (a pub in essence), with personalised bar area, self-service and very affordable quality plates. (Added March 2023)

name: El tremendo
description:
City: Sevilla
description: Tiny but characterful little tapas bar with metal counter and a host of personalised nik naks inside with a classic 70s appearance. Well reviewed. (added March 2023)

name: Bar Motocyklowy 2KOŁA
description:
City: Warsaw
description: Cool, low-key and informal with a motorcycle theme, live music, off-beat. (Added March 2023)

name: Hydrozagadka
description:
City: Warsaw
description: Well reviewed club with some ruin bar aesthetics and different spaces to explore. Definitely on the club rather than bar end. (Added March 2023)

name: The Unicorn Bathams
description:
City: Wollaston
description: An unspoilt Batham's pub with familiar old school charm and its range of ales. (added March 2023)

name: The Plough & Harrow Batham's
description:
City: Kinver
description: Old-school traditional boozer with familiar Batham's stable appearance. Well reviewed. (added March 2023)

name: The New Inn Bathams
description:
City: Wordsley
description: Old-school traditional boozer in the Batham's brewery stable with good reviews and familiar charms. (Added March 2023)

name: The Lamp Tavern Bathams
description:
City: Dudley
description: Traditional Batham's brewery tied pub with old-school boozer appeal and familiar charms, could go either way. (added March 2023)

name: Fox & Grapes Bathams
description:
City: Pensnett
description: Batham's brewery tied pub, an old school boozer with traditional Black Country charms, good reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: The Live & Let Live
description:
City: Bringsty
description: Super, rustic country pub with plenty of wood and hanging hops. Exposed beams, flagstone floor, pewter jugs. Great reviews. Looks well worth a try. (added March 2023)

name: The Cross House Tavern
description:
City: Tewkesbury
description: Superb looking micro-pub that has a traditional rustic appeal with some retro branding. Excellent reviews. (added March 2023)

name: The Weavers at Park Lane
description:
City: Kidderminster
description: Don't be confused, there are two such places. This looks excellent. Brick floor, real ales, classic beer signage, dartboard, homely interior. Very good reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: Taverna Kupljen Jeruzalem Svetinje
description:
City: Svetinje
description: Wine specialists in an uber-rustic setting of chunky wood with scenic views. Excellent reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: In 't Spinnekopke
description:
City: Brussels
description: A classic brown café interior can be found here at this estaminet, a pub-restaurant with space enough for drinking when it isn't peak evening meal times. Reviews vary but this still should be looked into. (Added March 2023)

name: Booze'n Blues
description:
City: Brussels
description: Fun, bluesy, sleazy looking bar with Jazz ephemera, great reviews. Does look good. Has to be worth a try. (Added March 2023)

name: Kava Bar Orfej
description:
City: Ptuj
description: A decent looking small pub with curved pivnice type ceiling, varnished wood fittings, leaning posts. Good reviews too. (Added March 2023)

name: Cafe Filmriß
description:
City: Zittau
description: Excellent looking pub-cafe with film memorabilia and highly personalised bar area. Great reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: Staromeštianska Pivotéka
description:
City: Bratislava
description: Basement multi-tap pub with traditional appearance and bang up to date beer options. Well reviewed. (Added March 2023)

name: Café de Hut
description:
City: Haarlem
description: One of the city's brown cafes, traditional unspoilt venue. Unusual bar top with round protrusions at each end to maximise seating/leaning space. (Added March 2023)

name: Proeflokaal de blauwe druif
description:
City: Haarlem
description: A truly classic historic tavern with aged wood, oil paintings, chandeliers, terrific reviews. Looks like a classic, maybe the classic in Haarlem. (Added March 2023)

name: Huiskamer café El en Ben
description:
City: Haarlem
description: Informal, personalised, homely and unspoilt corner pub with great reviews. Looks very nice. (Added March 2023)

name: Café Van Egmond
description:
City: Haarlem
description: A tiny unspoilt brown café with a reportedly friendly owner. Great reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: Café Sligting
description:
City: Overveen
description: Looks worth traveling to from Haarlem. Old brown café fixtures, art Deco era bar fitting, pool table, refined yet aged character. Good reviews too. (Added March 2023)

name: Café de Gooth
description:
City: Haarlem
description: Despite a listing as a restaurant this is a very publike interior which appears to us far more casual than a dining spot. Personalised with signage, wood fittings with grand old covered ceiling lamps, worth a try. (Added March 2023)

name: Café Du Theatre
description:
City: Haarlem
description: Fun, personalised and characterful little bar dominated by the bar area itself. Looks well worth dropping in for one. Reviews appear to agree. (Added March 2023)

name: Het Wapen van Bloemendaal
description:
City: Haarlem
description: Historic cafe with some dramatic arched fittings at the bar, some murals and preserved wood fittings. Stylish lamps and hints of Deco and Nouvau. Excellent reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: Bierreclame Museum
description:
City: Breda
description: This looks well worth a trip out from the centre. In the district of Princenhage is a pub/museum to beer signage. Cluttered is an understatement, this is one of those obsessions/labours of love manifesting in something special. Despite the museum element all reviews talk about the pub itself which is great news. No excuse to avoid this if in the area. (added March 2023)

name: The Ducie Arms
description:
City: Manchester
description: Attractive wood-fit bar, excellent reviews and several ales to get stuck into. Seems to be worth a look. (Added March 2023)

name: Farmers Arms
description:
City: Penzance
description: Characterful, informal hangout with a personalised interior of movie posters and musical instruments on the wall. Decent reviews, worth a look. (Added March 2023)

name: The Dolphin Tavern
description:
City: Penzance
description: A fairly well pier-side pub which of course does the usual coastal pub meals but has retained a sense of character with its beams, nautical theme and seemingly a good balance found. Very good reviews. (Added March 2023)

name: Les Distilleries Idéales
description:
City: Nice
description: A beautiful opulent bar, grand cafe style with ornate wood fittings, murals, etc. Not overly stuff by any means though, there are some personalised elements that clearly indicate this is for fun, not pretense. (Added March 2023)

name: La Boulisterie Club
description:
City: Nice
description: Bar with a petanque court inside. Modern warehouse conversion, bright and airy but looks to have a bit of quirkiness about it. Well reviewed. (Added March 2023)

name: Le Shapko
description:
City: Nice
description: Nice's best Jazz bar by all accounts, with a predictably colourful hint of sleaze about it - as you'd hope! Well reviewed, high up on the to-visit list in the city. (Added March 2023)

name: GIST
description:
City: Brussels
description: Beer specialists, a distinct focus on the tap offerings here. The venue has an inheritance of attractive stylish wood fittings but the decor is understated and muted by the standards of a traditional Brussels bar. It looks worth a try at least to sense what the atmosphere is like. (added March 2023)

name: La Cheminée
description:
City: La Plagne-Tarentaise
description: Apres-ski kiosk that looks quite fun. (Added March 2023)

name: The Minerva
description:
City: Hull
description: Riverside real ale pub with outdoor seating and indoors claims to have the smallest snug room in England. A wedge shaped building, relatively unusual and the site of a former microbrewery. There is still a bit of character in the front room but a rather over-officious front of house spoils the chance for typical pub informality and the backrooms are tired + stink of frying. A bit of a mixture, we can recommend it but still undecided about an inclusion to our guide. (added March 2023)

name: The Flowerpot
description:
City: Mirfield
description: A decent looking country pub, all-rounder, Ossett beers which is generally a good sign for a Yorkshire pub. Tiled floor, fireplace etc, not too corporate looking. On a first visit in October 2023 it didn't set our world alight but as it was a quiet Monday it is clearly worth another try (Added March 2023)

name: Kings Arms
description:
City: Sunderland
description: Fabulous looking traditional backstreet boozer with attractive wood fittings including woodstrip ceiling, bunker like, looks very good. (Added March 2023)

name: Pivnica Budweiser
description:
City: Zagreb
description: Pleasant looking Karczma type pub-restaurant with chunky wood interior, Budvar on tap and pleasant beer garden. Well reviewed. (added March 2023)

name: Ero
description:
City: Zagreb
description: Dark wood bar very unlike the majority of Zagreb's cafe bars, almost interest for that aspect alone, let's see. (Added March 2023)

name: Mr. Fogg
description:
City: Zagreb
description: Slightly steampunky modern bar with a reasonably dark, fairylit appearance in the evening. (added March 2023)

name: Klubokawiarnia LALKA
description:
City: Poznan
description: Very nice low key bar with homely surroundings, some live music, craft beer. Young, slightly bohemian. (Added March 2023)

name: Towarzysz Klub PRL
description:
City: Torun
description: Retro bar with 80s socialist nostalgia decor. Very well reviewed. (Added March 2023)

name: Café Sperl
description:
City: Vienna
description: Ancient preserved Viennese coffee house which has a social scene. You can drink, you can play pool but it was a bit too staid for us.

name: Délirium Café Vienna
description:
City: Vienna
description: Vaguely disappointing, owned by the same company as Mel's, with a much smaller beer list. Bar is curved, it is decent, perhaps worth a try if you're running out of options. (added March 2023)

name: Maggie´s Leberkas Stadl
description:
City: Graz
description: Very peculiar place that almost made our guide on atmosphere alone. Tiny bar specialising in meatloaf, but in practise a local's hangout. Cheery, and a tad camp too, it's a pub alright. (Added April 2023)

name: Brot & Spiele
description:
City: Graz
description: Not quite worthy, this pub and games complex has perhaps too much of a bowling alley/snooker hall atmosphere in places, but the main bar is good and the beer selection is, for Austria, very good indeed. (Added April 2023)

name: Craft Beer Bar
description:
City: Varazdin
description: Popular local's hangout, all about the atmosphere and the beer selection, not so much about the room which is very plain, almost a hollowed out hotel foyer. It doesn't make our guide quite, but it's worth keeping in mind as an option.

name: Caffe bar Picabia Varaždin
description:
City: Varazdin
description: Decent locals bar that is an all-rounder, really and surprisingly pubby. (added April 2023)

name: Pub Mlinarica
description:
City: Zagreb
description: Terrific beers in a roadside pub-restaurant. Somehow lacking a centre piece, a bar room that really makes the atmosphere sing. The bar area itself is too small. However, there is a lot to like. We are torn. Didn't quite make the cut on 2 visits. (Added April 2023)

name: Unijazz
description:
City: Prague
description: Relocated cultural cafe, friendly safe space with large rugs and comfy seats, but alternative enough to be interesting, with regular events. Beer options also good. Didn't quite make the cut but worth a look and a 2nd visit. (Added April 2023)

name: Planeta Žižkov
description:
City: Prague
description: The pubbiest of pubby pubs, a stalwart option in the district but everything about it says a solid 7/10. Likeable but didn't find it hit the heights in any area. Nonetheless, worth keeping up your sleeve as it is generally open and quite a versatile venue. (Added April 2023)

name: ROESEL - beer & food
description:
City: Prague
description: Keep walking, yes, straight ahead to the end, to this little pub cafe that has inherited historic curved ceilings and treads a line between drinking hole and light-bite venue. A younger, hipper crowd here, but prices remain fair and it has caught the attention of locals too. You may need to be prompt on weekends in order to get a table. Beer is excellent and the food is worth the money, staff are generally young, helpful, polite and multilingual. We haven't included it on our guide overall however as it lacked any X-factor to speak of. A little too plain? Anyway, there is a lot to like, it's worth keeping in mind. (Added April 2022)

name: U Kocoura
description:
City: Prague
description: A vital stopgap if you can't get in U Hrocha, this would be a very nice pub if it didn't have the sense of being an overflow area, a Plan B. It's a little tired, but the beer is cheap and the operation is honest. A rarity in the district. It isn't quite on our guide but it deserves circulating for practical purposes. (Added April 2023)

name: Niewinność Wine Bar
description:
City: Warsaw
description: Wine bar with 4-5 tap options in a market stall with seats and hoardings widening the sense of pub. Produce is excellent, service kind and helpful, venue going on twee but distinctive enough to avoid being bland, and certainly not overly pretentious. Didn't quite make the cut on our first visit but worth bearing in mind. (Added April 2023)

name: The Duke Of York
description:
City: Salisbury
description: A traditional side-street boozer. Rated highly by BRAPA, information thin on the ground but what there is looks homely and promising. Worth a try at least. (Added April 2023)

name: The Three Horseshoes
description:
City: Bradford-on-Avon
description: Traditional freehouse with a homely, personalised and non-chain appearance. Characterful bar area, occasional live events, great reviews and close to the train station. Surely worth a try? (Added April 2023)

name: The Boot & Flogger
description:
City: London
description: Sprawling wine bar, wood-fittings and one of a kind, excellent reviews, looks like a distinctive venue with multiple rooms. (Added April 2023)

name: The Purleigh Bell
description:
City: Purleigh
description: Traditional genteel village pub with settles, beams and so forth. While a little staid in appearance there seems easily enough to justify a visit. (Added April 2023)

name: Tutu Whiskey & Jazz Club
description:
City: Torun
description: We visited but alas, only at closing time. This looks like one we genuinely missed out on and should have tried to get to, but you can't win them all. Give it a go. Great reviews. (Added April 2023)

name: Thonet
description:
City: Poznan
description: Interesting looking bar with some more comfortably and homely features than some of the towny options. (Added April 2023)

name: Kafe Zale
description:
City: Krnjaca
description: Beautiful looking beer bar with homely features such as a piano and far more pubby feel than the usual Balkans efforts. Great beer options and superb reviews. (Added April 2023)

name: Three Kings Inn
description:
City: Hanley Castle
description: Village freehouse with a truly beautiful traditional, genteel interior including a characterful bar area. Comes highly recommended by third parties and very well reviewed. (Added April 2023)

name: Park Tavern Pub
description:
City: Kingston-upon-Thames
description: Traditional pub with comfortable upholstered bench seating and loungey interior including fireplace. Highly personalised with ceiling festooned with pump clips, good ales, excellent reviews. (Added April 2023)

name: Taberna de Angel Sierra
description:
City: Madrid
description: Long standing taberna with key distinctive features, it's huge barrels, a ceiling mural and stained glass among other things which give it a sense of institution. Looks very good, of course being Spain, the format and formalities are open to question, so the only way to know for sure is to go! (added April 2023)

name: Café Zsivágó
description:
City: Budapest
description: Retro Kavarna which stays open late, by which time hopefully the atmosphere will have developed into something special. Very well reviewed. (Added May 2023)

name: The Black Horse
description:
City: Hellifield
description: Intriguing Inn with a characterful and highly personalised bar area, great reviews but full info thin on the ground. We shall try to correct this. (Added May 2023)

name: The White Bear
description:
City: Devizes
description: Traditional market town tavern with low beamed ceilings and Bacchanalian artwork above the bar. With some tasteful tweaks in terms of furnishing, hopefully they will continue exhibiting the true character of the place and not turn it into bland middle aged place with Laura Ashley prints. (Added May 2023)

name: Labský Zámek
description:
City: Liberec
description: Tough finding good pubs in central Liberec but here is one with a First Republic era nostalgia to the prints and wood strip panelling, but it's not all a museum piece. Looks to have a personalised, ad-hoc and quite homely feel. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2023)

name: The Black Swan pub
description:
City: Shepshed
description: Not much info around about this but it seems to be a nice cosy little backstreet pub with comfortable communal seating and a bit of character. Well reviewed. (Added May 2023)

name: Midgehole Working Men's Club (aka The Blue Pig)
description:
City: Midgehole
description: Famous unvarnished and old school club/pub (added May 2023)

name: Pivnice Na Zastávce
description:
City: Světlá nad Sázavou
description: A very pubby Pivnice with large communal tables and warm interior. (Added March 2023)

name: The Anchor Inn
description:
City: Wingham
description: Unspoilt traditional pub with basic furnishings and genteel decor, in line with the surroundings. Very well reviewed. (added May 2023)

name: Church Inn
description:
City: Prestwich
description: Multiroom boozer with a communal, social layout. Organ in one room, social events. Overall seems worth a try if in the area. (Added May 2023)

name: Rivoli Ballroom
description:
City: London
description: A fantastic preserved ballroom and night spot, cult venue with amazing reviews. Opulent, preserved and time stood still type decor, this is well worth a look. (Added May 2023)

name: Pivnica "Usporavanje"
description:
City: Niš
description: A low-key more homely pub, simple furniture but good reviews and apparently very well liked. (Added May 2023)

name: Pivnica Nemir, Niš
description:
City: Niš
description: Reasonably pubby looking bar with some superior beer options. (Added May 2023)

name: Hush Hush Lounge Bar
description:
City: Niš
description: One of the better garden bars, still looks reasonably ad hoc and not over-glammed up. On our visit we enjoyed the surroundings but it didn't quite make the grade. Worth keeping in mind as a fallback option though (Added May 2023)

name: Paris Art Ame
description:
City: Niš
description: Vintage antiquey café that looks like a standout. How bar like it is remains to be seen, but it deserves a try. Great reviews. (Added May 2023)

name: Gardoš Pub
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Terrace bar with pubby interior and views, very well reviewed. Worth a look. (Added May 2023)

name: Pivo i kobaja
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Pubby beer bar with breweriana signage and contemporary food - sausage in particular. Although pleasant it was reasonably generic and the beer options were disappointing. (Added May 2023)

name: Vox Blues Club
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Part in/part out little cabin club with a terrace, rustic decor and stage for live performances. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2023)

name: Polet
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Ruin-bar type interior with crackling plaster and degrading walls. Interesting terrace space too with climbing ivy and graffiti. Partly art space. (Added May 2023)

name: Pivnica Realist
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Very pubby pub with leather upholstered seats, dark wood, niches, framed mirrors and ex-pat type beers. Looks well realised without being too hokey. Well reviewed.

UPDATE: On our first visit it was clear it was a solid mainstream pub but didn't really stand out. A decent fallback option (Added May 2023)

name: Das LANGE Pub und Beisl
description:
City: Vienna
description: Intriguing pubby possibility somewhere between a true drinking venue and gaststatte. (Added May 2023)

name: The Black Horse
description:
City: Leicester
description: Unspoilt communal traditional village pub with upholstered bench seats, multi-room, cask ales, hatches, tiled floor, wood panels. Looks a near cert inclusion. Well reviewed. (Added May 2023)

name: The Hole In The Wall
description:
City: Torquay
description: The kind of intimate little beamed, higgledy seaside pub you hope to find. Very well reviewed - a little foody? We shall see. (Added May 2023)

name: Cigla & Krigla Pub
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Aside of the good selection of local beers this is an otherwise reasonably generic pub, though competent and fairly shady, nothing outstanding. Worth having up your sleeve as a fallback option. (Added May 2023)

name: Varia Craft&Beer Bar
description:
City: Novi Sad
description: Safe and friendly craft beer bar with loungey upstairs. Nothing hugely of interest aside the beer selection though. (Added May 2023)

name: Pivnica ''Moto klub''
description:
City: Novi Sad
description: Reasonably good evening hangout with motor decor and free popcorn but didn't fully click to deserve a guide inclusion. Maybe we'll give it another try one day. (Added May 2023)

name: Freeport Cultural Center
description:
City: Pecs
description: A worthy cultural centre straddling mainstream and alternative, decent enough but was slightly lacking across the departments to merit an inclusion

name: Gajba
description:
City: Osijek
description: Small craft beer pivoteka down a side street with very local life of Croatian hipster bros hanging out. That said, it's social, friendly and has a nice selection, somewhere you can go and find English spoken, no problem. We wouldn't add it to our guide but would keep it in mind if you're on a jolly around Osijek. (Added June 2023)

name: Doctor Bier
description:
City: Quedlinburg
description: A bar we must have missed on our journey. A proper kneipe - drinking den with football scarves on the ceiling, dark interior. Well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: Docker Brewery & Beer Garden
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Sprawling modern brewhouse and garden in ex-industrial space,with plenty of options. Didn't quite make the cut on our first visit but not by much. Perhaps a little on the corporate side of things. Worth a look. (Added June 2023)

name: Falkland Arms
description:
City: Great Tew
description: A country pub with attractive low-ceilinged interior with flagstone floor, fireplace, exposed beams, glazed mugs, fairylights and chunky furniture. Real ale - yes - a given, and it doesn't look like it's been 100% turned over for dining just yet. (Added June 2023)

name: Karavella Sörbár
description:
City: Pecs
description: Large range of beers (by Hungarian standards) in a modern setting. Highly uninteresting decor and no atmosphere but some people will enjoy it nevertheless for the product.

name: Restaurace Na Hrádku
description:
City: Prague
description: One of the remaining 'Fours', fourth grade pub that hasn't been driven to closure by chains or costs. Simple format, unchanged in years, cheap food, cheap booze, local life. Worth a look - try evenings for more atmosphere. (Added June 2023)

name: Vacuum Art Bar
description:
City: Prague
description: Interesting arty/punk bar with garden, vegan street food and foosball. Ring for entry. Worth a look? (Added June 2023)

name: Pivnice Na konečné
description:
City: Prague
description: A survivor at the tram terminus. Not as famous or cult as Prvni Pivni Tramway but looks pretty damn good still. Featured on Praha Ozrala TV series on the episode about estate pubs. Has had the chain pub Gambrinus thing added to it though, some of the old interior has been slightly sterilised, but on our visit we found honest service, clean well tapped beer, unbeatable prices and a case of true stamgasty and regulars who all know each other. It slightly missed an inclusion overall but if you're in the area or fancy a quirk or a pilgrimage for some of the cheapest beer in the city, you could do worse. (Added June 2023)

name: Hospůdka u Bartoše
description:
City: Prague
description: Bernard beer and pub dog in a tiny drop in knajpa/ausschenk. All locals. The rear room is decorated in a throwback genteel homely fashion. Closes early. Didn't quite make the cut on a first visit but there will be time to return (Added June 2023)

name: Hospůdka U Pošty - Doma
description:
City: Prague
description: One of those frozen in time pubs that appears to have kept much of the best of the Czech hospoda intact. On our first visit it was a true fourth-grade pajzl, slightly intimidating at first but harmless inside, 1990s atmosphere. Didn't quite tip the balance. (March 2024)

name: Hospoda U Procházků
description:
City: Prague
description: Local pajzl, worn-in with its own character, net curtains, ceiling fan, a certain lost in time quality. Very cheap Gambrinus. Purely for hanging out. Good reviews. Worth a try? (Added June 2023)

name: Aleš VANICKÝ - ALVA
description:
City: Prague
description: An unusual, homely looking pub/café with rugs, artwork on the walls and a curved ceiling giving off a real sense of intimacy. Folk music and other community events, this really looks like a must-visit venue.

WARNING - This is a private members club set up so that smoking could continue inside. In order to attend you will need to acquire membership. Do not just turn up, as you may be disappointed.

name: Bar Bakeliet
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Retro signage and neighbourhood charm proves to be a successful gezellig combination judging by reviews. Worth a look? (added June 2023)

name: Klid v ruchu
description:
City: Olomouc
description: Interesting little cabin with nice beer garden. Seems worth a look. (Added June 2023)

name: Baar Living Room ät.
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Well reviewed bar in a large old green wood strip cladded house with vintage furnishings. Seems worth a look! (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Drewutnia
description:
City: Kraków
description: Well out of the centre, this Karczma type pub has rustic charm and local life. Was too quiet on our first visit to give a fair appraisal but seems like it would be pretty atmospheric when busy. (Added June 2023)

name: The Shepherd's Rest Inn
description:
City: Lumbutts
description: Looks like a fairly decent unspoilt country/roadside inn with carpets, beams, brasses, the works, and very well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: The Bulls Head
description:
City: Monyash
description: Unspoilt, quite genteel Derbyshire country inn with an appealing cosy-looking interior. Excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: Strawanza
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A slightly alternative post-grad bar that has more of a French bar feel than German overall. A little bit of a clique feel, but worth a try if you are seeking a change from the traditional beer halls. (Added June 2023)

name: Cafe Clodette
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Good looking café straddling the brown café format with some more modern leanings. Worth a try, well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: Southgate Inn
description:
City: Devizes
description: Superb looking traditional real ale pub with social, informal setup and genteel surroundings. Well worth a look, excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: The Butterleigh Inn
description:
City: Butterleigh
description: Village pub with genteel rustic interior, simple surroundings. Excellent reviews. (Added June 2023)

name: The Leathern Bottle
description:
City: Lewknor
description: Simple rustic village pub with typical, timeless surroundings. Well reviewed. (Added June 2023)

name: Sidrērija
description:
City: Riga
description: Unusual venue, a cider place with warm pubby surroundings. (Added June 2023)

name: Poltimore Arms
description:
City: Yarde Down
description: Beautiful rustic rural pub with hanging hops, candles, piano, pool table, settles and almost the works that make up a traditional English pub. Unspoilt and authentic, this looks superb. (Added June 2023)

name: 't Waagstuk
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Reopened and renovated, a larger venue than the typical brown café but not unlike it in décor. Good beer selection. Good reviews. Worth a try? (Added June 2023)

name: De Broodwinning
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Well-reviewed little corner brown cafe with personalised bar area and a bit of character. Food but definitely pubby space in there. (Added June 2023)

name: Luda Kuća
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Homely neighbourhood pub with the lurid detail that war criminal Radovan Karadzic used to frequent it. (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Brod
description:
City: Belgrade
description: Looks a pretty decent all-rounder pub overall with a terrace too. Good reviews, worth a look? (Added June 2023)

name: Pub Got
description:
City: Herceg Novi
description: A distinctive, very well reviewed pub with personalised interior, pubby interior with beams and jugs, and a sea view on the terrace. Potentially superior drinks options. (Added June 2023)

name: Bierteufl
description:
City: Vienna
description: Wood, wood and more wood at this pubby cabin of beer. Looks worth a try. (Added June 2023)

name: Cafe Weidinger
description:
City: Vienna
description: A frozen in time retro café that's quite a distance away from the average opulent, dressy venue in Vienna. (Added June 2023)

name: Radocha
description:
City: Krakow
description: Reasonably interesting little basement pub, low-key, usual explosed brick vaults, some decoration in a rustic/artsy theme. Excellent reviews, apparently some folk nights. Worth checking out. (Added June 2023)

name: Ministerstwo Tajemnic
description:
City: Krakow
description: Theme pub, unofficial wizard world with 3 floors and plenty of attention paid to the decor and environment. Good reviews overall but grumbling about table service and erratic quality of food. Still, looks unique, worth a try? (Added June 2023)

name: Świat Piwa
description:
City: Kraków
description: Bottleshop with small cosy hangout space, looks alright and well reviewed. We visited here in 2022 but it didn't exactly blow us away. A standard craft beer cafe, decent rather than distinctive (added October 2021)

name: Mały Kredens Katowice
description:
City: Katowice
description: Kazimierz style antique café bar that looks fairly brooding and atmospheric. (added June 2023)

name: Teoria – kluboczajownia
description:
City: Katowice
description: Interesting looking offbeat cafe bar. The angle is tea but there is a selection of alternatives, and it is mainly about the atmosphere. Very good reviews. (added June 2023)

name: Stacja Bosacka
description:
City: Krakow
description: Versatile looking corner pub with table football, pizza, decent beers. Well reviewed. On our first visit we liked the basement warren of rooms but it was still lacking wow factor. Might try again when it's night time (Added June 2023)

name: Red Lion Pub
description:
City: Ampney St Peter
description: A hidden gem, a little museum of a rural pub that has passed ownership recently but all signs point to its heritage being maintained. Very little info but surely worth a look if even vaguely close by. (Added July 2023)

name: Zwiebelfisch
description:
City: Berlin
description: Decent looking pubby bar/wirtshaus with some lived in character. Worth a look. (Added July 2023)

name: The Three Mariners
description:
City: Hythe
description: Cult backstreet boozer and hangout with real ales and unspoilt interior. Looks very good. (Added July 2023)

name: Pension REZEK-Jeruzalem
description:
City: Vitkovice
description: Revivalist Inn with preserved interior. Fabulous reviews, looks homely and cosy. (Added July 2023)

name: Letní výčep Beranova pivovaru
description:
City: Bílá
description: Very pleasant looking rustic, revivalist farm brewery with genteel inn and gardens. Excellent reviews. (Added July 2023)

name: IL COVO Beer House
description:
City: Peschiara del Garda
description: Brick vaulted homely little craft beer bar with some personality that can be seen. Excellent reviews, worth a look, surely. (Added July 2023)

name: Pivo Friisgatan - en tjeckisk ölstuga
description:
City: Malmö,
description: Czech and German beer specialists in a traditional, authentic looking setting. (Added July 2023)

name: Brauhaus Döbler GmbH & Co. KG
description:
City: Bad Windsheim
description: A classic dark brown unspoilt Gaststatte interior, excellent own brewed beers, A recommended city centre staple which reaches a higher standard than most, supposedly. (Added July 2023)

name: Zielono Mi
description:
City: Kraków 
description: Popular with locals, this tram terminus shack has an exposed wooden interior with beams but relevant feeling décor and atmosphere. Maybe missing a few touches but worth a look next time out? (Added July 2023)

name: Brasserie de l'Ermitage
description:
City: Brussels
description: Although the bar area is identikit modern craft bar, the venue itself, former industrial use has a fair bit of character. Popular and well reviewed, conveniently located too, so probably worth a look. (Added July 2023)

name: Wyszak Family Brewery
description:
City: Szczecin
description: Central vaulted cellar with stunning interior, typical city centre brewpub format otherwise, but seems worth a try. (Added July 2023)

name: Hospoda Brouk
description:
City: Prague
description: Friendly evening dive bar with table football and the most casual, battered old hangout spot. Perhaps short on an inclusion but worth having up your sleeve. We've been here a few times. (Added 2020)

name: Kawenzmann
description:
City: Bamberg
description: Tiki bar/cocktail bar that fell just short of an inclusion overall, but is worth looking out for with an adventurous cocktail menu and some flair to the decor. (Added August 2023)

name: Bahler Zoigl
description:
City: Neuhaus an der Waldnaab
description: Zoiglstubn, one of many brewing families in the village

name: Pivní lok
description:
City: Cheb
description: Basement bottle shop cum bar with curved ceiling and some space to socialise. Modern options. Looked decent when we had a poke around, but didn't have time to stay for a drink. (Added August 2023)

name: Stefflwirt
description:
City: Wiesau
description: Unspoilt family owned pub who are also a butcher's more or less guaranteeing a good spread of food with the beer which is local unfiltered Zoigl type stuff. The interior looks legit with wood panels and simple communal tables. Worth a go. 

Please note this is a Zoigl pub and therefore only open 1 x every month. Please consult the Zoigl Kalendar or their Facebook for further info (Added August 2023)

name: Zoiglstub‘n Fichtenschacht
description:
City: Wiesau
description: Another treasured Zoiglstube, family run pubs that use a communal brewery and open on rotation a few days a month when their beer is ready to drink. Unique and well worth seeking out, though refer to the Zoigl Kalendar online to ensure it will be open for your visit (Added August 2023)

name: Wort&Klang
description:
City: Erlangen
description: A fashionable but still pretty casual, ad hoc studenty bar with vintage furniture, the usual impressive Franconian beer selection, piano and table football. (Added August 2023)

name: Steinbach Brewery Erlangen
description:
City: Erlangen
description: An ur-typical city brewpub with revivalist retro-signage, huge rows of hanging hops, exposed brewkit and atmospheric beer garden. (Added August 2023)

name: Brauereigaststätte Barnikel
description:
City: Herrndorf
description: A pickled in aspic pub with a brewing operation that ceased in 2012 (their beers are now contract brewed by Rothenbach in Aufsess) but the main appeal is the surviving quirky charm of the bierstube, local life and still good food and drink. Worth a look! (Added August 2023)

name: Klosterbräu Bamberg
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A brewing reputation that has soared back to the heights in recent years with its smoked and dark beers particularly acclaimed. The venue didn't completely knock us over last time, a little bit twee and stuffy in the bar area, while the better side room lacks a focal point and really deserved to have the bar there. This leaves a slightly mixed picture where we couldn't justify an inclusion. If you are doing a crawl of the breweries though, you need to keep this in mind. (Added August 2023)

name: La Grappe
description:
City: Rennes
description: Super wine bar/bistro that also served beer, cocktail, whiskies in an intimate personalised environment. A great shame we missed it on our last visit (Added August 2023)

name: One Pint Pub
description:
City: Helsinki
description: A nice looking all-rounder, modern but reasonably pubby with a good selection. (Added August 2023)

name: Ravintola Henriks
description:
City: Tampere
description: Aka Kerho, this is a traditional wood-fit corner pub with a great beer selection. (Added August 2023)

name: Stöhrenkeller
description:
City: Bamberg
description: A local pubby hangout spot with a balance of socialising and food. (Added August 2023)

name: De Gele Poraa
description:
City: Brussels
description: A local fun hangout spot. Wood strip, table football, live music. Well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: Vinicola Mentridana
description:
City: Madrid
description: Traditional tabern with wall of wines and simple tables. Mixed reviews but seems legitimate, worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: U Kováře Matěje
description:
City: Vesely Kopec
description: Genteel rustic country Hostinec with wood panels and homely feel. Well reviewed and it certainly looks like a good one! (Added August 2023)

name: Zájezdní hostinec Krčma
description:
City: Lanskroun
description: A rustic pub more akin to a German Gaststatte, Dark wood, heavy beamed ceiling, genteel furnishings. The surroundings look pleasant (Added August 2023)

name: Brüsseler Eck
description:
City: Berlin
description: A Kiezkneipe with retro bar and signage, simple working class pubby vibes. Worth checking out. (Added August 2023)

name: Auracher Löchl - Stollen 1930
description:
City: Kufstein
description: Highly unusual venue, a complex even with some rustic nooks in the restaurant, but the star of the show is the gin bar with the widest selection in Austria - and they claim the world! (Added August 2023)

name: The Gladstone Arms
description:
City: London
description: As featured in David Jesudason's 'Desi Pubs', British Indian-run pub mixing eclectric decor, good beers and community events. Cultural melting pot and Clearly a must-visit. (Added August 2023)

name: The Providence
description:
City: Plymouth
description: Super personalised, cosy-looking backstreet pub with a neighbourly feel to it. Superb reviews, surely worth a look. (added August 2023)

name: The Triangle Tavern
description:
City: Lowestoft
description: Award winning sidestreet boozer with good range of ales, hops above the bar and genteel surroundings. Well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: The Rumburgh Buck
description:
City: Rumburgh
description: Unspoilt country in with small bar, flagstone floor and settles. Excellent reviews, Genteel, rustic charm. (Added August 2023)

name: Carpenters Arms
description:
City: Walterstone
description: A superbly unspoilt remote country inn with original rooms, flag stone floors, fireplace and cosiness all around. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Cask Beer
description:
City: Porto
description: Beer specialists with 1 cask line (not in use on our visit) in a small cafe bar with mezzanine area near the river. The overall experience was fine but not outstanding. (Added September 2023)

name: Taberna da Poncha
description:
City: Lombo do Moleiro
description: Fabulous looking worn-in, homely roadside tavern with a personalised appearance. Very highly rated. (Added August 2023)

name: HopTrip Craft Beer Shop
description:
City: Matosinhos
description: A modern but personalised and highly rated craft beer hangout. (added August 2023)

name: Macska
description:
City: Budapest
description: Well reviewed venue with exposed brick vaults and live music. (Added August 2023)

name: Wolframstubn
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: Home brew in a real family run pub. Go now while you still can. http://zoiglbier.de/zoigltermine/ Check if it'll be open

name: Gasthof Weisser Schwan
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: A very pleasant rustic Gasthof with a social scene of sorts and Zoigl on tap. It does feature on the Echter Zoigl's list of official venues and apparently they brew. The place didn't quite cut it for a guide entrant but is well worth checking out. Be careful with opening times. (Assessed on July 2023, and again October 2024)

name: Loistl Rudolf u. Anni, Zoigl-Schänke
description:
City: Windischeschenbach
description: Unclear if this is open any longer, but it is one of the town's Zoiglstubn where families use a communal brewery then open their doors on rotation. Hopefully it isn't dead. (Added August 2023)

name: Zoiglstube "Hammerer"
description:
City: Tirschenreuth
description: Zoiglstube. Not part of the Echter tradition but still a rare and dying practise. Go now while you can. (Added August 2023)

name: Zoigl-Stube Hofner
description:
City: Konnersreuth
description: Zoiglbier from Falkenberg at this Oberpfalz Zoiglstube.

name: Zoiglstubn zum Glöckerlbauer
description:
City: Weiden in der Oberpfalz
description: Excellent personalised, homely looking Zoiglstube that looks like it will be cosy in Winter. Great reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Bar Emily
description:
City: Malaga
description: Superbly cosy looking little bar with framed photographs studding the wall, and fairylights. Excellent reviews. Looks like a must-visit. (Added August 2023)

name: Seven Stars
description:
City: Dartmouth
description: An unsympathetic greywashing may have occurred but the low ceilings and bar area remain unspoilt with a good degree of authenticity in the town's oldest pub. Maybe to file under promising rather than world beating. (added August 2023)

name: Casa Puga
description:
City: Almeria
description: Classical tiled tavern from 1870 with personal touches all over. Maybe a little upright and food-focused? We'll see... (Added August 2023)

name: Dog & Partridge Inn
description:
City: Sowood
description: Unspoilt, seemingly perservering old country pub. Info thin on the ground but excellent reviews. Worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: The Fir Tree Pub
description:
City: Oxford
description: Victorian corner pub with some whimsical, personalised decor, retro signage and great reviews. Looks a potential star. (Added August 2023)

name: Dambusters Inn (Official Hours On Website)
description:
City: Scampton
description: Famous RAF memorabilia pub. Certainly an impressive array on show, but signs of unwise redecoration too when compared with the pubs appearance even 2 years ago. It will have to be seen, nonetheless. (Added August 2023)

name: The Castle Tap
description:
City: Reading
description: Decent looking casual ale house with cases racked up behind the bar, wooden bench seating, globe lighting and handsome ornate back bar with tankards. (Added August 2023)

name: The Blue Ship
description:
City: The Haven
description: An unspoilt genteel country Inn with low slung ceiling and rural flavour. Good reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Freed Man
description:
City: Walmer
description: A truly superb looking neighbourhood pub, labour of love interior with personal possessions and a lovely social setting. Very strong reviews. Need to go here. (Added August 2023)

name: Bishops Wine Bar
description:
City: Croydon
description: Peculiar brown café styled wine bar in unusual shopping centre location. A one-off. Worth a look? (Added August 2023)

name: The Woodman's Stroke
description:
City: Rothley
description: Attractive, unspoilt looking village pub with typical traditional interior of low beams, chunky tables and settles. Outstanding reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Woodlark Inn
description:
City: Lambley
description: Perhaps a little twee in its furnishings and decor but also looks very homely. A village pub with natural social space and charm. Very well reviewed. (Added August 2023)

name: The Basketmakers Arms
description:
City: Brighton
description: A must-visit venue, a neighbourhood pub with friendly approach and highly personalised interior without losing the backstreet boozer aesthetic or charm. Excellent reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: The Watchmaker's Arms
description:
City: Hove
description: A small alehouse with some charm, personality and atmosphere. Genteel decor with mid-brown wood furniture and fittings and hanging hops. (Added August 2023)

name: 100 Renthen
description:
City: Lviv
description: Well-reviewed true local pub with lots of taps and good neighbourhood life. (Added August 2023)

name: O Nosso Bar
description:
City: Funchal
description: One of a few remaining local's corner bars. Oddly even has Franziskaner on tap. Affordable and friendly, occasionally gregarious. You will be tolerated. (Added August 2023)

name: Pub Number Two
description:
City: Funchal
description: Pubby tavern that looks like an all-rounder. Perhaps a backup/versatile option. (Added August 2023)

name: FugaCidade
description:
City: Funchal
description: Multitap craft beer bar with a tolerable enough looking interior. Well reviewed. Didn't quite cut it overall, despite friendly service and a great beer selection, the venue itself was a little lacking (Added August 2023)

name: Café Klandestino
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Colourful, eclectic and atmospheric looking bar with great reviews. (Added August 2023)

name: Social B
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Attractive evening bar with arched ceiling, lamps and wooden back bar. (Added August 2023)

name: Alface Hall Hostel & Bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Informal hangout spot with music, looks pretty atmospheric, although the connection to hostel/backpackers may give pause for thought. Still, may check it out. (Added August 2023)

name: Cockpit bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Small but very characterful, densely decorated cocktail bar. Intimate with tall ceiling, mezzanine area overlooking a bar. (Added August 2023)

name: Otto Schrüfer
description:
City: Preisendorf
description: A genteel Gaststatte and microbrewery with home spun hospitality and supposedly a friendly crowd. Well reviewed. Check opening times carefully. (Added September 2023)

name: Romanoff pub
description:
City: Porto
description: Cocktail bar with grand chandelier type glass ornamentation at the bar, and style that seems to run somewhere between Jugenstil and gothic. Compact, well reviewed. (Added September 2023)

name: Dog & Duck Inn
description:
City: Beverley
description: Comfortable loungey neighbourhood pub with a local crowd and good ales. Well reviewed. Worth a look at least? (Added September 2023)

name: The Royal Oak
description:
City: Driffield
description: Perplexingly short on info on google but from what we've seen elsewhere this is a fine, comfy looking neighbourhood pub off the beaten path. Worth a try, surely. (Added September 2023)

name: Grove Tavern
description:
City: Tunbridge Wells
description: Low ceilinged, warm wood fit neighbourhood pub that looks quite pleasant. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Mala Gissona Beer House Gros
description:
City: Donostia
description: A very tidily put together craft beer specialists taking cues from a range of spots. Modern but well executed with an identity and feel to it, seemingly. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Albert Tavern
description:
City: Freuchie
description: Special traditional pub with old school hospitality, a rarity in the area. Great reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Moseleck
description:
City: Frankfurt
description: Says Gaststatte outside, and a Pilsbar feel inside, and the combination appears to form a pubby Germany pub (relatively rate). Rough and ready of course, but personalised and worth a look at least. (Added September)

name: The Prince of Wales
description:
City: Farnborough
description: Tasteful low key village pub with half timber exposed brick walls, upholstered bench seats, several cask ales. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: The Railway Inn
description:
City: Lower Largo
description: Low ceilinged, cosily appointed 'proper pub' with excellent reviews. A real gem for the area. Looks well worth trying. (Added September 2023)

name: The Old Ship Inn
description:
City: Perth
description: Cosy wood fit town tavern with a bunker like feel but friendly approach. Great reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Bakery Kvilda Ltd.
description:
City: Kvilda
description: Intriguing operation - brewery and bakery with environment of wood strip classic hospoda. No amazing reviews but surely worth look into? (Added September 2023)

name: Dreadnought Leith
description:
City: Leith
description: An alehouse with a relevant feel while keeping in place some of the classic fittings. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: The Warwick Arms
description:
City: London
description: Attractive classical corner London pub with ornate wood fittings, distinctive decorations and tiles by the bar. (Added September 2023)

name: The Halfway House
description:
City: Pitney Hill
description: Genteel rustic country pub with big fireplace, hanging hops, low key furniture and multiple ales on offer. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: Kings Head
description:
City: Gunnerside
description: Unspoilt Pennines village pub with the ensemble of cosy seating, chunky furniture, low ceilings, fireplace, flag stone floor, real ales and big portions of pub grub. Excellent reviews. (Added September 2023)

name: King's Head Theatre Pub
description:
City: London
description: Intimate looking pub with theatrical memorabilia and a traditional Victorian fit layout, with quirks such as a pre-decimal till. Some real ales on offer. (Added September 2023)

name: The Anne of Cleves
description:
City: Melton Mowbray
description: An upright, slightly food focused but still attractive rustic pub with flagstone floor, fireplace, chunky furnishings and ales. Well reviewed, surely worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: The Prince Rupert
description:
City: Newark on Trent
description: A new reason to try Newark? Retro signage in an expanded building which has kept its character well with ante-rooms and an atrium. Well reviewed. (Added September 2023)

name: Snob Bar
description:
City: Lisbon
description: Damn...well, it seems we missed out on this one. Famous in the 70s for being a place for latest news and gossip for journalists and politicians, you'll find an intimate, shady wood fit interior with table lights. Although recent reviews have dragged it down, it looks worth a try for the ambience and interior alone. (added September 2023)

name: Pivnice 8
description:
City: Brno
description: Popular multitap place with a local crowd, light wood but reasonably nice looking space and great reviews. Have been there twice now and it's close but not quite crossing the threshold (Added September 2023)

name: Pivní bar Na Maničkách
description:
City: Brno
description: Homely, personalised rustic pub with vaulted beams, exceptional reviews. Looks really promising! (Added September 2023)

name: Expedition Clubhouse - SirFogg.com
description:
City: Brno
description: Bohemian hangout with musical instruments, performance events, casual space to explore. Worth a look? (Added September 2023)

name: Levist Väljas
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Basement bar for locals with brick vaults, one that "hasn't changed like all the others", supposedly. When we visited it felt a bit tacky overall, but you may wish to keep it in mind for a late option (Added October 2023)

name: Naabrid
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Decent looking antiquey atmosphere in this multitap craft beer bar with great reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Purtse Tap Room Telliskivi
description:
City: Tallinn
description: A strong contender here, multitap bar with a bit of personality and character, natural ambience. (Added October 2023)

name: Бар Света
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Artsy off-beat 'space' which becomes a club later on. It's quite serviceable overall but a bit too warehousey. Worth bearing in mind though.  (Added October 2023)

name: Clarendon Public House
description:
City: Marske
description: Throwback boozer with out of time toilets and North East flavour. Rare example of real ale upkeep in the region. (Added October 2023)

name: The Old Bowling Green
description:
City: Winster
description: Old club house and pub in stone building. Excellent reviews and a fairly unspoilt interior too. (Added October 2023)

name: Den Obelix
description:
City: Halle
description: Reasonably brown café like interior with good beer options,  local favourite by the square. (Added October 2023)

name: 8 Sail Brewery Ltd.
description:
City: Heckington
description: Dramatic setting by train station and windmill for this rustic brewery tap. Excellent reviews, looks well worth a try. (added October 2023)

name: The Edgar Wallace
description:
City: London
description: Well-reviewed drinking bunker studded with beer clips, retro signage above a thick carpet. Some misgivings about the furnishings but looks easily worth a try. (Added October 2023)

name: Star Inn
description:
City: Wenhaston
description: A must-visit pub with recovered signage and a rustic, country feel. Super reviews. (added October 2023)

name: Kneipe Knaack 94
description:
City: Berlin
description: Bawdy casual hangout with red light, curtains and upturned bottles from the ceiling. As much a casual kneipe as all that though, a typical Berlin kiezkneipe. (Added October 2023)

name: Bar Belga
description:
City: Fuengirola
description: Fairly faithful pubby looking Belgium themed café with good beer selection. Well Reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: The Admiral Lord Rodney
description:
City: Colne
description: Attractive homely pub with good real ale selection, just outside the town by the river. (Added October 2023)

name: The Central
description:
City: Gateshead
description: Famous Gateshead pub that's a stalwart on the Tyneside pub scene. (Added October 2023)

City: Gdansk
description: A nice, cosy enough looking bar, colourful and clandestine, fairly informal. Good reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Pod rurami
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Krcma type exterior and tales of good value and old fasioned format inside. Well reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Z INNEJ BECZKI
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Decent enough looking multitap craft beer bar with a bit of colour and design, decent crowd. (Added October 2023)

name: Graciarnia
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Basement pub, informal and fairly unpretentious looking hangout spot. Excellent reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: Bar piwny
description:
City: Gdansk
description: A true survivor, an old snack/bar pub from the PRL era churning out kebabs and cheap beers. (Added October 2023)

name: Alexandra Hotel & pub
description:
City: Hull
description: Heritage interior with supposedly vamped up beer range. Good reviews too. (Added October 2023)

name: The Red Lion
description:
City: York
description: A heritage pub in pleasingly ramshackle old building, with some nice wood fittings inside. All the same, the prevailing feeling is they aren't quite making the most of it. We'll give it another try...

name: The Tap, Ossett
description:
City: Ossett
description: Well reputed Ossett Brewery tied pub. Social focus with pub games and a cosy interior with fireplace and communal seating. Although it didn't set our world on fire on a first visit it was easily good enough to justify a 2nd visit (added October 2023)

name: Robin Hood Inn
description:
City: Pontefract
description: Reasonably nice looking roadside pub with low beams, and cosy interior. Not a rustic throwback though, looks to have been refurbed and is relatively up to date in its offerings too. Well-reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Hostinec U Rudyho
description:
City: Boskovice
description: A worthy enough looking personalised pub with an informal, rustic/genteel look, fairly compact. Excellent reviews. (Added October 2023)

name: "Chata Karkonoska"
description:
City: Karpacz
description: Wonderfully chunky wooden Karczma with sloping roof, huge beams and communal wooden tables. Highland life with Krakonos beer from Czechia. Looks good (Added October 2023)

name: Zamilec
description:
City: Brno
description: A largely outdoor venue that looks cosy and personalised, excellent reviews. Hauskrecht on tap. (Added October 2023)

name: Separé Vinotéka
description:
City: Prague
description: Old fashioned Vinarna (the sort that have been dying out to extinction), family-run cosy pub, unpretentious but wine focused. Several taps and interesting decor with mounted cabinet of woodwork tools (Added October 2023)

name: U Cihelny
description:
City: Prague
description: Reasonably nice looking, unspoilt and traditionally pubby pub-restaurant, a PU establishment. (Added October 2023)

name: Hospůdka U Kladiva
description:
City: Prague
description: Old school drinking den with large beer garden. 3 permanent beer lines and 1 rotating guest offering. Very low prices. West Ham United decoration. It was pleasant on our first visit but didn't quite tip the balance. We'll try again. (March 2024)

name: Hostinec Na Zámyšli
description:
City: Prague
description: Surviving old-school 4th grade Staropramen hospoda, remnant of a bygone era. Interior looks very atmospheric. Need to go here. (Added October 2023)

name: Restaurace Klepáč
description:
City: Prague
description: 'Country club', in reality an old boozer which occasionally does folk nights. Classic unspoilt boozer with an older crowd and basic drinks, eg. Breznak. Looks out of time enough to be a curiosity. Look out for Na Taborce around the corner two as some of the information has been mixed up (Added October 2023)

name: Pivní zastávka
description:
City: Prague
description: Bottleshop cum bar with an informal atmosphere. Set in a half step basement with simple seating and a social feel. Very well reviewed. (Added October 2023)

name: Pivovarská Restaurace
description:
City: Prague
description: Surviving village style pub with genteel decor and classic throwback environment. Hubertus Kacov reputedly served the best it can be (a low bar) at a low price for Prague. We found the experience pleasantly quaint on our first visit but it wasn't busy enough to get a true picture of its potential. (Added October 2023)

name: Hospudka U Kopeckych
description:
City: Prague
description: A nice looking truly pubby type operation - wood all around - with some hockey decoration. On our first visit we probably arrived too early to get a full picture of the place, but we'll return. (Added October 2023)

name: u Parku
description:
City: Prague
description: Very popular parkside Branik pub, we walked past and it was glowing with warmth and good social vibes. Members only, but you can try your luck. (Added 2023)

name: Restaurace U Šmídů
description:
City: Bila Tremesna
description: Superb looking pub opposite the train station with a personalised, genteel exterior and community to it. Featured on Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs' (Added November 2023)

name: Pohostinství U Šulců
description:
City: Zabori
description: Another superb looking old pub, featuring on Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs', with a Krcma type country interior, lived-in and personalised appearance. Great reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Hostinec Lok Ham
description:
City: Hluboká nad Vltavou
description: Tidy, social focused pub with an intimate space, some live music, and a mix of people. (Added November 2023)

name: Hostinec Jamajka
description:
City: Bílá
description: Information thin on the ground, but it features in Czech TV's 'Tales of Old Pubs', and appears to have a preserved interior and bar area, as well as exceptional reviews for food. (Added November 2023)

name: The Glassmaker Tavern
description:
City: Lindava
description: Large traditional beer hall in a glass-making factory where you can see the glass made as you drink. A one-off, featured in Tales of Old Pubs on Czech TV. (Added November 2023)

name: Viper Bar
description:
City: Zlin
description: Basement late night hangout with a vibrant crowd. Informal. Didn't quite cut it on our visit but wasn't far away, and I'd return. (Added November 2023)

name: Vyhoukaná sova
description:
City: Olomouc
description: A new wave pub with good craft options and a lively social scene that looks worth a try - next time perhaps. (Added November 2023)

name: Hübner Bräu Brauereigaststätte
description:
City: Steinfeld
description: A super-looking and very well reviewed village brewery/pub-restaurant in traditional style. (Added November 2023)

name: The Reporter. Bar
description:
City: Belfast
description: A small, intimate traditional bar in the city with a literary history. Very well reviewed, looks great. (Added November 2023)

name: Nelson Head
description:
City: Horsey
description: Beautiful traditional country in with large fireplace, guns mounted on the wall and selection of sailing/nautical artwork. (Added November 2023)

name: The Earl of St Vincent
description:
City: Egloshayle
description: Refurbished and reopened traditional village pub that has kept its character. (Added November 2023)

name: Brauerei Zum Goldenen Adler Gasthof Endres
description:
City: Hofen
description: Intimate, unspoilt village pub with woodstrip walls and 1970s appearance. Very well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Steps Bar
description:
City: Glasgow
description: Old-school boozer, somewhat of an institution with a mix of exposed wooden beams and grand deco type pillars. (Added November 2023)

name: Labeerynt
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Beer specialists on the site of the former 'Polski Kino' bar. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Balsam
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Characterful, warm-hued café bar boasting Pilsner Urquell. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Den Toogoloog
description:
City: Middelkerke
description: Beer specialists, reportedly among the best offerings in the country. Interior bland in places but some nice touches with breweriana and a mug collection. Worth a look? (Added November 2023)

name: The Kings Arms
description:
City: Manchester
description: Overall, looks worth a try. Attractive interior isn't quite replicated inside but the offerings are up to date and relevant and there appears to be a good social scene. Well reviewed (Added November 2023)

name: The George Tavern
description:
City: London
description: Old boozer turned into a music venue. Ramshackle, bohemian interior, a little spartan but there should be times where it hits a sweet spot. Well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: The Five Horse Shoes Inn
description:
City: Barholm
description: Characterful village pub with genteel, rustic furnishings and decor. Very well reviewed. (Added November 2023)

name: Lyndon House Hotel
description:
City: Walsall
description: Hotel with ground floor pub decorated in traditional style. Comfortable upholstered bench seating, fireplace, patterned carpet and wallpaper. Looks to have a lot of character, several cask ales available. (Added November 2023)

name: Olde England
description:
City: Northampton
description: Characterful neighbourhood pub in traditional style. Strong drinks selection, great reviews. Needs to be visited. (Added November 2023)

name: The Mill Inn
description:
City: Withington
description: 17th century village pub with attractive garden by a stream. Tastefully decorated inside sympathetic with the building. Unfortunately a Sam Smiths operated pub. (Added November 2023)

name: Rock Circus
description:
City: Ghent
description: Characterful boozer with a rock theme, plenty of tap options and lively nightlife. Good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Karaf House
description:
City: Kyrenia
description: Characterful and atmospheric bar, candlelit with exposed stone and wooden beams, with a wine focus. Very good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Telefoneke
description:
City: Antwerp
description: Very cosy little café, lived-in with a personalised touch to it. Very non-corporate. Looks like a must-visit venue. (Added November 2023)

name: Konsulat Dobrego Piwa
description:
City: Sopot
description: Low key, fairly characterful pub off the beaten path with some multitap beer options. Very good reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Café Commerce
description:
City: Leuven
description: Attractive retro décor somewhere between a brown café and grand café, well reviewed and different from the normal offerings in the city. (Added November 2023)

name: Eet-,whisky - en bierkroeg 't Kruiske
description:
City: Deerlijk
description: Beer and whisky specialists, the venue itself reasonably characterful with wood panels and breweriana on the walls. Perhaps leaning towards a Restobar, pub restaurant, so we'll see. Excellent reviews. (Added November 2023)

name: Põhja öökull
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Beer specialists under ancient brick vaults. Looks reasonably informal and cosy, if spacious. Excellent reviews. Unfortunately it wasn't open on the days of the week we visited. (Added November 2023)

name: Barbar
description:
City: Estonia
description: Well reviewed rock-club with a well put together, if not exactly spectacular interior. The enthusiasm for the place isn't unexpected (all rock pubs tends to get ott reviews), but perhaps worth having up your sleeve as an option (Added November 2023)

name: Whisper Sister
description:
City: Tallinn
description: Speakeasy - reservation in advance required, smart casual dress code. Looks a very atmospheric setting and great reviews. Multiroom cocktail hideout. (Added November 2023)

name: Felix Felicis
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Harry Potter themed cocktail bar. If you can stomach the theme, the staff are friendly and the cocktails are very good. A pretty effective effort. (Added December 2023)

name: Pub Spółdzielczy
description:
City: Gdansk
description: Basement craft beer pub with 22 taps including 2 cask bars. Bar itself a bit too plain to make the cut but friendly service and the options are the best in the city. (Added December 2023)

name: Café Botteltje
description:
City: Ostend
description: Wood-panelled all-rounder with a good selection of bottles. Worth a look, at least? (Added December 2023)

name: Černokostelecký pivovár
description:
City: Kostelec nad Černými lesy
description: Not only a super brewery but an old fashioned Pivovarska Restaurace too, looking suitably rustic and characterful. (Added December 2023)

name: U2D, Pivnice U Dvou Dobráků
description:
City: Opava
description: Characterful bar in vaulted half step basement with ceiling covered in bar stickers. A Pivoteka and base for a nomadic local brewer as well. Great reviews and easy to see why. (Added December 2023)

name: Gold-Ochsen Brauerei
description:
City: Spielbach
description: Popular family-run pub which is surely not long for this world with a retirement age brewmaster and host, and typical lack of succession planning or heritage preservation in the region. (Added December 2023)

name: The Queens Arms
description:
City: Cowden Pound
description: One of the few remaining hostess pubs with an elderly owner - now assisted by members of the community. Opens limited hours on weekends - check before visiting. (Added December 2023)

name: Hospoda L.P. 1867
description:
City: Bratřejov
description: Superb looking characterful Hostinec with a rural, revivalist interior and cosy rustic surroundings. Excellent reviews and easy to see why. Surely worth a look if you're even vaguely in the area. (Added December 2023)

name: The Black Bull, Blaydon
description:
City: Blaydon
description: Unspoilt boozer with live gigs - a local institution. Superb reviews and not difficult to see why. Surely worth a look if in the area. (Added December 2023)

name: Ye Olde Tavern, Kington
description:
City: Kington
description: A superb looking pub est 1767, original timbers and serving hatch remains, with flagstone floor and fireplaces. Served as a station pub for a long gone railway line. We already know without going it will be an instant hit for us. (Added December 2023)

name: The Feathers Inn
description:
