description: Characterful traditional boozer with more than a few quirky touches, a contrast to its spartan and unprepossessing exterior. Excellent reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: The Birkbeck Tavern
description:
City: London
description: Impressively grand, plush multi-room pub that is still a boozer at heart. Regular live music acts and free pool on Monday + Thursdays. Good reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Prince George
description:
City: London
description: A really appealing looking multi-room pub of fireplaces, warm hues, stripped back furnishings. A must visit. (Added January 2025)

name: The Windermere
description:
City: London
description: A grand Deco style pub with impressively preserved fittings. Loungey space in places. Good reviews. (Added January 2025)

name: Yorkshire house
description:
City: Shrewsbury
description: Rare example of a central rock pub, 1990s style. Unvarnished and a mixture of Tudor beams and rock/metal murals. Cash only. Some decent cask ales on offer, otherwise a simple back bar. Didn't quite make the cut but wasn't far off. A love/hate venue for many, not doubt., but an important point of difference in a small city. (Added February 2025)

name: Zum Välta Brauerei-gasthaus Fößel-mazour
description:
City: Appendorf
description: Frankly incredible looking Muzik-stube, a complete throwback with antique instruments, driveway with porch and German singalongs. (Added February 2025)

name: Fecske Presszó
description:
City: Gyor
description: A reasonably personalised and distinctive hangout near the college, music theme and lounge furniture, all informal. (Added February 2025)

name: The Wern Fawr Inn
description:
City: Ystalyfera
description: A must visit pub with a highly personalised interior of nik naks and farming equipment, someone's labour of love. In 2025's CAMRA good beer guide also. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Soggy Bottom
description:
City: Saint-Étienne
description: Good beers and a distinctive venue, albeit with a very silly name. Well reviewed, and has to be worth a look while in town. (Added February 2025)

name: Lovas kiskocsma, kerthelyiség.
description:
City: Pomáz
description: Interesting personalised hideout with a curved ceiling. Certainly something different. Worth a look? (Added February 2025)

name: The Elephant pub, Faversham
description:
City: Faversham
description: A very well put together traditional pub with many of the key features you're seeking in place including frames and characterful interior, leafy beer garden and ale selection. Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: The Goat and Tricycle
description:
City: Bournemouth
description: Specialist real ale tavern with fanciful name, notable for its glazed faience tiling out front and interior which is somewhere between classical and quirky. Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: Café Cinema
description:
City: Berlin
description: Famous graffiti strewn hangout remarkable close to Alexanderplatz and more mainstream sights and businesses. Somewhat "discovered" on the tourist trail be surely a worthy diversion. (Added February 2025)

name: Bristol Bus Cafe
description:
City: Târgu Mureș
description: A very cool looking ramshackle old hangout with garden and knockabout interior. Alternative crowd. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Café des Arts
description:
City: Annecy
description: 8 beer taps and a historic venue in the old town with beamed interior and artsy décor. Looks perhaps a little staid (this is Annecy, but while in town perhaps worth a closer look). Well reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: Grüner Baum (Wirtshaus Groß GmbH)
description:
City: Kasendorf
description: Classical Franconian pub with Magnus beers brewed by a Kasendorf family member. A typical traditional interior that should be left be and not modernised further. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Tafarn Sinc.
description:
City: Rosebush
description: Looks like one of Wales' most characterful pubs. A homely, lived-in and dare I say it...yes..rustic interior with fireplace, high-backed settles, dartboard. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Kulturbahnhof Parapluie Weiden
description:
City: Weiden in der Oberpfalz
description: Although it didn't quite make our cut, there is something charming and unexpected about this pub. A large venue with live music in a concert room with a bar area and lounge. Very much a cultural and neighbourhood hub for this side of the tracks. Be aware you can access this from the station platforms, you don't have to walk around (just be careful). We're keeping it here as a backup for you. (Added February)

name: Sam ohne Katzen SoK
description:
City: Nuremberg
description: Very well reviewed cocktail bar in brooding low lit, bawdy interior with cat them. Looks like this may have been where the former Mr Kennedy's was located. (Added February 2025)

name: HEMINGWAY'S MUSIC & JAZZ BAR
description:
City: Linz
description: Well put together moody late bar for cocktails, with the typical low lighting and library/study theme. Very good reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: ACW Saloon
description:
City: Plzen
description: US style saloon bar with a surprisingly firm commitment to the theme - something very different for Czech pubs. We ended up here out of chance in 2018 but will give it another try soon. (Added February 2025)

name: Restaurace & Hotel U Salzmannů
description:
City: Pilsen
description: One of the historic Pilsner pubs. We've been a few times and found it a grand space, but the social aspects left something to be desired. Still, we can only keep trying. (Added February 2025)

name: Tavern Na Potravinach
description:
City: Pilsen
description: Pitchside pub with a football team and pool table. Looks like a friendly, well personalised hangout. Good reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Hospůdka U PECHTŮ
description:
City: Pilsen
description: Riverside pub with a strong identity, good terrace for outdoor drinking and wood strip interior with sports club scarves. Well reviewed particularly for the quality of beer tapping. (added February 2025)

name: Čechurovská hospůdka na blbym místě
description:
City: Plzen
description: A smoking pub with very personalised saloon style aesthetic, purely locals of course. Well Reviewed. Be sure to be polite when entering. (Added February 2025)

name: Franciscan Well Brewery & Brewpub
description:
City: Cork
description: A big budget venue with modern, low-lit interior and large covered outdoor area with heating in colder months. Upstairs "speakeasy" and function areas. Pizza oven outside. A functional, versatile venue that probably needs to be visited again. On our wider recommendations until then (Added February 2025)

name: El Fenix Bar
description:
City: Cork
description: Another Rising Sons Brewery pub we didn't quite make it to. Despite the name, the interior is a traditional one. Live music venue. Seems well worth a try. (Added February 2025)

name: Antikvariát
description:
City: Brno
description: A library-cum-bar with high bookshelves around café lounge tables. Looks worth a try. (Added February 2025)

name: Sandinos
description:
City: Derry
description: Colourful and vividly decorated bar dedicated to a Nicaraguan revolutionary, tying in together lots of global causes. Very good reviews and clearly one of Derry's standouts. (Added February 2025)

name: McGinleys Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Traditional pub with eye catching back bar fittings, and lounge space with low key, familiar, cosy furnishings and decorations. Popular spot, well-reviewed. (Added February 2025)

name: The Cottage Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Whitewashed old cottage with homely interior and striking, over-the-top ceiling decoration with hundreds of mugs fixed to the beams. Very popular and well reviewed. Looks a must-visit while in town. (Added February 2025)

name: Blake's Bar
description:
City: Letterkenny
description: Down to earth, but warm, and homely decorated pub. Think about pubs like Corn Dolly in Bradford. Excellent reviews. (Added February 2025)

name: Hostinec u Pundů
description:
City: Horní Žďár
description: A social document, and a community pub in one. Little altered homely hangout with the usual mixed crowd, occasional outbursts of music. Looks great. (Added February 2025)

name: Holešovická šachta
description:
City: Prague
description: Intriguing tucked away art gallery, courtyard and bar complex. Modern, slightly punk/boho, worth trying out. (Added February 2025)

name: Hospoda Na Padesátém
description:
City: Prague
description: A really nice little holdout of a pub. Personalised with fishtank and characterful bar area. Down to earth format, looks quite unchanged by modern times. (Added February 2025)

name: Cyngwajs - rekonstrukcja historyczna
description:
City: Lublin
description: A fairly charming retro/antique cafe. Excellent reviews. Thanks to Kocsmaturista for the tip-off. (Added March 2025)

name: Alt Berlin
description:
City: Berlin
description: Essential old brown Kneipe, exceptional reviews. Lamplit interior. Pool and pils. (Added March 2025)

name: Jinonická garáž (Cotton Bar)
description:
City: Prague
description: Possibly a diamond in the rough. Cabin style pub out in an area which to put it mildly is not exactly a lively, pubby neighbourhood. Info thin on the ground but worth a look. (Added March 2025)

name: Chapel of wine Szeged
description:
City: Szeged
description: Incredible chapel of beer with remarkable interior, and relatively sympathetic looking furnishings. Well reviewed. Surely worth a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Hasenstall - Würzburg
description:
City: Würzburg
description: A good bar in Würzburg? Steady there. Well, it's an evening bar that looks to have some nice interior fittings and atmosphere, although signs of that ridiculously tacky Kneipe stuff too. Oh well, there's so little else to visit bar-wise in the city that you should probably give it a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Bierhuis De Klomp
description:
City: Delft
description: Looks like an absolute classic brown café similar to the likes of De Pilsener Club in Amsterdam. Dark wood strip, lamp light, good back bar too. Board game selection extensive. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Café Le Penseur
description:
City: Middelburg
description: Colourful informal bar with cultural meetups and some characterful interior features (beams etc), Well reviewed too. (Added March 2025)

name: The Joiners Arms
description:
City: London
description: Neighbourhood pub with a countrified interior - brasses and horse saddles, along with related ephemera. Half timber interior, upholstered seating. Looks well cared for too. Well reviewed. Looks an essential stop. (Added March 2025)

name: U Baumannů Česká
description:
City: Česká
description: An upright traditional pub restaurant type hospoda. 5 Dalesice beers on tap. Looks well worth a short train ride out from Brno Kralovo-Pole. (Added March 2025)

name: Hospoda U Orla
description:
City: Brno
description: Classic hospoda in Brno outskirts. Traditional taproom. Excellent reviews, but information thin on the ground. (Added March 2025)

name: Buthmanns Bierstuben
description:
City: Lübeck
description: Unchanged historic interior and 'brown pub'. An institution beyond the typical German kneipe. A must-visit. (Added March 2025)

name: Pub If - Lübeck
description:
City: Lübeck
description: Quaint little old hangout, a characterful pub with history. Exceptional reviews. Slight Irish leaning but thankfully not a theme pub. (Added March 2025)

name: Brommy
description:
City: Bremen
description: Excellent, atmospheric looking little bar with seafaring decor and green walls, leather seating. An old boozer. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Horner Eck
description:
City: Bremen
description: Alternative/left-wing co-operative pub with cheap prices and rustic interior. Excellent reviews. (Added March 2025)

name: Haifischbecken - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Cult raucherkneipe (smoking pub) with seafaring decor, little gigs. Superbly unpretentious and distinctive for the area. (Added March 2025)

name: Zum Haltepunkt
description:
City: Bremen
description: A somewhat lost in time kneipe with a rustic late night drop in feel. A slew of negative reviews appears to have since been corrected by some more positive. Tread carefully. (Added March 2025)

name: Wiener
description:
City: Bremen 
description: Lamplit boudoir type bar with red walls, an artsy feel, and bookshelves. Seems well worth a luck for atmosphere. (Added March 2025)

name: September
description:
City: Lüneburg
description: Atmospheric evening place, low lit in historic premises. Good reviews given the central location. Looks like one of the few good options in the town. (Added March 2025)

name: Gondi Kult.Ur.Bar Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Looks like a must visit corner pub with some stylish retro fittings, not the usual old man raucherkneipe. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Flusshexe
description:
City: Bremen
description: High-ceilinged corner pub with globe lights and a classical, warm, lost in time feel. (Added March 2025)

name: Heroes - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Corner pub, reasonably sized with pool and darts, dark wood and some interesting, unexpected stained glass features. Well reviewed, looks worth dropping by. Smoking permitted. (Added March 2025)

name: Ständige Vertretung Rheinland Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Institution venue, framed photos of politicians lining the walls. High ceilings and grand, somewhere between cafe, pub and restaurant. (Added March 2025)

name: Rum Bumper's
description:
City: Bremen
description: Must see punk-pirate pub. As with most pubs in the district, distinctly anti-fascist. Typical punk environment in some respects, but more clutter around the bar too. (Added March 2025)

name: Die Fliege - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: A little raucherkneipe with impressive wood fitting and seafaring theme. Looks like one of the better options near the station. (added March 2025)

name: Chameleon Jazz Bar - Bremen
description:
City: Bremen
description: Live Jazz in a low lit boudoir style venue with distinctive curved bar. Well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Drittel Bar
description:
City: Bremen
description: Punk pub on the outside but a fairly cool antiquey lounge bar inside. Alternative scene. Exceptional reviews. (Added March 2025)

name: Hart Backbord
description:
City: Bremen
description: Approachable, friendly looking corner café bar with an alternative scene. Excellent reviews, looks to perhaps be a few different bottles and drinks available also. (Added March 2025)

name: Druide e.V.
description:
City: Bremen
description: Looks like an excellent old school pub with some level of local renown too. Wood strip interior and a neighbourly feel. (added March 2025)

name: Bela Lugosi - Nürnberg
description:
City: Nuremberg
description: Purely for fans of punk-alternative bars, but looks like a good one here, and so central too. Great reviews and a counterpoint to the majority of nightlife in the city. (Added March 2025)

name: U Chřestýše
description:
City: Plzeň 
description: A wrong side of the tracks hangout with snake based décor and informal setup. Looks more characterful than the typical setup, very much a dive though. (Added March 2025)

name: Hemingway Pub
description:
City: Plzeň 
description: Corner pub, looks more of a late bar. Informal, characterful appearance. Good reviews too. (Added March 2025)

name: Bierbar Funzl
description:
City: Forchheim
description: A market town kneipe but looks to be on a far superior level to most with retro signage in the interior, local beers and a much more informal atmosphere. (Added March 2025)

name: Das Balan
description:
City: Munich
description: Information perhaps deliberately thin on the ground but looks like another Boazn worth a look - atmospheric late bar with characterful interior. Well Reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Schwarzer Hahn
description:
City: Munich 
description: Punk bar with a classic alternative setup. (Added March 2025)

name: Bar Boazeria
description:
City: Munich
description: Very characterful, slightly hip twist on a Munich boazn. Very well reviewed. (Added March 2025)

name: Fairplay Saloon
description:
City: Munich
description: A very pleasant looking pubby corner kneipe with pool, musical instruments and arty decor. Surely worth a try. (Added March 2025)

name: Tumult
description:
City: Munich
description: Underground bar in brick vaults, characterful, unpretentious hangout spot. (Added March 2025)

name: Schön-Stüberl
description:
City: Munich
description: Boazn popular with 1860 Munich fans nearby. A real throwback of a kneipe. (Added March 2025)

name: Gaststätte Großmarkthalle
description:
City: Munich
description: Old fashioned classical beer hall that closes at 4pm, mainly does service for Weisswurst Fruhstuck, the famous Munich breakfast of white sausage and wheat beer. High ratings for the quality of sausage and not very touristy. As a venue it looks well worth checking out. (Added March 2025)

name: Café Merlo
description:
City: Brussels
description: Reasonably characterful looking brown café with exposed beams, personalised interior, particularly at the bar, and arty touches. Definitely drinks focused. (Added March 2025)

name: Le Marseillais du jeu de balle
description:
City: Brussels
description: Almost typed 'Marseille' in the city section. Well, it's a Marseille themed corner bar with personalised interior, Pastis and something quite different to the norm. (Added March 2025)

name: JORAN - Cidrothèque
description:
City: Brussels
description: An unusual one - cider focused bar in a pleasant, compact, but airy bar. Excellent reviews, a real specialists. (Added March 2025)

name: L'âne Fou
description:
City: Brussels
description: Very well reviewed classical wood fit Estaminet/pub with piano, mirrors, globe lights. Seems entirely possible to come for a casual drink as well as food. (added March 2025)

name: Brasserie de la Mule
description:
City: Brussels
description: Brewpub specialising in German beers. Unsure of the venue itself as a standout but has had so many recommendations, so need to try it. (Added March 2025)

name: L'Ermitage Saint-Gilles
description:
City: Brussels
description: Saint-Gilles multitap craft beer joint with an atmospheric looking interior, highly rated. (added March 2025)

name: U Váhy měšťanský hostinec
description:
City: Prague
description: Revamped classical Czech hospoda, in traditional style but newly fit. Excellent reviews with a continuity of good food. (2025)

name: Rennsalon
description:
City: Munich
description: Long standing staple of the district, looks intriguing, low lit with interesting back lit bar, a little ramshackle, great reviews. (added April 2025)

name: Zoiglstube "Zum Binnerlindl"
description:
City: Kohlberg
description: Zoiglstuben with old fashioned rustic family charm. They buy the Zoigl bier from other producers but otherwise the formal is similar. Go now before it closes. (Added April 2025)

name: Plectrum
description:
City: Bayreuth
description: A little cabin with personalised wood strip interior and leafy beer garden. Looks well worth trying. (Added April 2025)

name: BarnAut
description:
City: Catania
description: Atmospheric retro ramshackle café with leafy courtyard and shabby chic interior. Excellent reviews. Looks well worth a go. (Added May 2025)

name: Razmataz | Wine Bar Catania
description:
City: Catania
description: Classic retro café with wood panels, mirrors, globe lights and old signage. worth a try, surely? (Added May 2025)

name: The Fleur De Lys
description:
City: East Hagbourne
description: Classical styled traditional pub with timber frame elements, fireplace, dart board and low beams. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Mc & Sons
description:
City: London
description: Old woodfit city tavern bar accented by globe lights sets a classic tone. A well reviewed bar that's surely worth a try. (Added May 2025)

name: Roots
description:
City: Kimberley
description: Micropub with tasteful traditional fittings and retro hoardings. Several real ales available, excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Zum Stiftl Stehausschank
description:
City: Munich
description: A popular new format in Munich, small taproom that taps Augustiner Hell from the wood barrel at busy times. The format is quite like a bustling city bar as they try to capture the magic of the more impromptu options. This is a little more slick and bland than that, but the atmosphere when busy is good, as is the excellent beer. Worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: Casablanca Bar & Café
description:
City: Munich
description: Looks to have some potential here. Characterful latin accented late bar with a warm interior and cosy surroundings. (Added May 2025)

name: Tavarn Ty Elise
description:
City: Plouyé
description: Astonishing labour of love. The connection with Wales and Brittany comes to life in a spectacular way here. (Added May 2025)

name: Trichter - Nürnberg
description:
City: Nuremburg
description: Unsure how this one slipped the net. Late bar and kneipe with a modern but fairly well-done looking interior. (Added May 2025)

name: Kavos Sunrise
description:
City: Kastro
description: Simply put, a legendary venue, with a venerable, grizzled owner hosting drinks in a beach overlook and cosy, highly personalised little tavern. (Added May 2025)

name: Kupica Italbolt
description:
City: Kecskemét
description: Old fashioned backstreet pub with classic interior and billiards table. Very well reviewed but little online presence outside of Facebook group Mutass egy kocsmat! (Added May 2025)

name: The Hyde Tavern
description:
City: Winchester
description: A colourful and pleasantly rickety venue that shows the diversity of the pub can include places like this. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Prinzipal Kreuzberg
description:
City: Berlin
description: Funky cocktail bar with a not too generic image, worth a look surely? (Added May 2025)

name: Madame Claude
description:
City: Berlin
description: Ancient old boudoir type bar in a former brother. Somewhere to hangout late. Occasional live music. (Added May 2025)

name: Clash
description:
City: Berlin
description: Classic punk scuzz bar with pinball and walls plasters in posters, stickers and graffiti. Cult venue. Well worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: Cafe Commune
description:
City: Berlin
description: Leftist bar with a casual approach, a loungey cosy 'laden' as they call it.  Literary meetups. (Added May 2025)

name: Lerchen&Eulen
description:
City: Berlin
description: Off-beat, atmospheric, post-grad type bar, a bit of an all-rounder, but looks worth a try. Well reviewed. (Added May 2025)

name: Red Lion
description:
City: Checkley
description: A classic cosy traditional pub with communal bench seating and carpeted lounge, exposed beams and garden views. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Hugo's kælder
description:
City: Køge
description: A successful, and fairly swish big budget version of a traditional basement pub with exposed brick, wood fittings, warm lighting and very good beers available on rotation. Looks an essential visit if in the city. (Added May 2025)

name: Schokoladen
description:
City: Berlin
description: Alternative culture centre for events, gigs, late night parties and courtyard socialising. (Added May 2025)

name: Leeds Arms
description:
City: Scarborough
description: Compact real ale pub with fireplace and  exposed beams, keeping a touch of the coastal pub character. (Added May 2025)

name: The Tamworth Tap at Tamworth Brewing Co
description:
City: Tamworth
description: Traditional pub interior and leafy courtyard, a venue offering an excellent beer selection. (Added May 2025)

name: La Trapperia Beer Shop
description:
City: Córdoba
description: Belgian beers in a small bottleshop-bar. Excellent reviews, certainly worth keeping in your back pocket in a city like Cordoba. (added May 2025)

name: Sammamera Freising
description:
City: Freising
description: A traditional Gaststube with changing beer selection. Looks casual, vegan options on their menu too. (Added May 2025)

name: The Eight Bells
description:
City: London
description: Unspoilt London boozer with similar interior to the likes of the Lord Clyde in Southwark. Seems well worth a look. (added May 2025)

name: Au Revoir Bar
description:
City: Athens
description: Looks like a must visit venue. Atmospheric wood-fit interior with warm lighting and mezzanine. Artsy interior. Excellent reviews. (added May 2025)

name: Imeros
description:
City: Athens
description: Atmospheric late bar with boudoir type feel playing only traditional Greek music. (Added May 2025)

name: Bodega Josefa
description:
City: Barcelona
description: How did we miss this? A classic old timer bodega with all the trappings. Highly personalised. Looks excellent. (Added May 2025)

name: Apfelwein-Wirtschaft Fichtekränzi
description:
City: Frankfurt
description: Looks like a classic Apfelwein house with traditional fittings, similar to DAX if not quite as elaborate. (Added May 2025)

name: The Adam & Eve
description:
City: London
description: A traditional unspoilt pub with typical corner London boozer interior: stained glass, wet ceiling, ornate wood fittings. (Added May 2025)

name: Eetcafé Het Brughuis
description:
City: Muizen
description: Appealling looking pubby café with traditional fittings but a recent looking clean up. Classic interior with exposed brick, retro signage. Belgian beers, of course. (Added May 2025)

name: Restaurace Sport - Kuklík
description:
City: Kladno
description: A suburban pub with regular events and functions. Historic, and unreconstructed interior, very minimal! (added May 2025)

name: KAFE NŮŽKY PAPÍR
description:
City: Prague
description: Unijazz-style cafe bar with bookish, slightly pubby interior, live events. Superb reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Hostinec U Farlíků
description:
City: Křtiny
description: Throwback pub with wood fittings, net curtains, mounted antlers (you get the idea). Village life. (Added May 2025)

name: FBB Klub Na Dráze
description:
City: Brno
description: Colourful alternative club-bar with courtyard and games. Entry fee at some times of day - be warned. (Added May 2025)

name: The Posada
description:
City: Wolverhampton
description: Heritage pub with some ornate Edwardian fittings, etched glass and high ceilings. Drinks on the mainstream side, but probably worth a look. (Added May 2025)

name: An Teach Beag
description:
City: Clonakilty
description: Whitewashed stone cottage housing a traditional pub, part of a guesthouse. (Added May 2025)

name: Saloon of The Artists
description:
City: Milan
description: Backstreet late bar with artistic interior, atmospheric. (Added May 2025)

name: Cox18
description:
City: Milan
description: Famous cultural centre and alternative hangout spot. (Added May 2025)

name: Ittolittos
description:
City: Milan
description: More of a traditional pub/tavern experience with craft beers including some on handpull. Leather seats, wood fittings, etc. Seems like it might be atmospheric in the evenings. (Added May 2025)

name: Leoncavallo Autogestito Public Space
description:
City: Milan
description: Self-managed co-operative with alternative feel and cultural events. (Added May 2025)

name: Cascina Autogestita Torchiera senzacqua
description:
City: Milan
description: Ancient farmhouse turned cultural centre/squat with a colourful and highly distinctive interior. (Added May 2025)

name: La Fiaschetteria
description:
City: Bergamo
description: Wonderful looking old-time wine bar/enoteca with characterful historic interior left to shine. (Added May 2025)

name: Il Brutto Anatroccolo
description:
City: Milan
description: Looks like an absolute must visit unreconstructed trattoria, a retro delight with fair prices for great cooking - seems to turn into a bar later, open til 1am. Warning - closed weekends. (Added May 2025)

name: Osteria del biliardo
description:
City: Milan
description: Former co-operative style bar with a stuck in the 70s decor and billiard tables. Play attention to the website as it isn't simply a restaurant - you can come for a beer and socialise with friends here. (Added May 2025)

name: Consorzio Birre Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Colourful and eclectic beer specialists with a good range and seemingly good atmosphere too. Well rated. (Added May 2025)

name: Carrobiolo Brewpub
description:
City: Monza
description: Brewpub with exposed brick and well-lit pub/bar space. Seems worth a try. (Added May 2025)

name: Scott Duff Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Despite an ex-pat sounding name, this charming pub-café with good beer selection seems well worth trying out. (Added May 2025)

name: Isola della Birra
description:
City: Milan
description: A cosy, wood-fit beer bar with a down to earth look to it. Reviews are mixed but the selection looks impressive and environment in keeping with what they're trying to do. (Added May 2025)

name: Blues Bikers Motorcycle Pub
description:
City: Milan
description: Excellent reviews for this densely decorated pubby venue which looks well curated with some decent beers available. (Added May 2025)

name: Barbruto
description:
City: Milan
description: A pubby beer café with a decent range, also known for its sandwiches. One 'to have up your sleeve', it looks like. Well reviewed too. (Added May 2025)

name: Stalingrado
description:
City: Milan
description: Lost in time 1960s beer hall who has seen better days, but the environment appears to still retain some essential charm, the survival element being perhaps the key to it. (Added May 2025)

name: Tassello del Sei - Pub Rock Birra Cibarie
description:
City: Milan
description: Well rated rock pub with warm interior and informal approach. Ayinger and some special beers on tap and in the fridge. Excellent reviews. (Added May 2025)

name: Spine
description:
City: Brescia
description: Beer specialists with handpumps, a wide range and a punky, lived in bar area. Very well rated. (Added May 2025)

name: Birrificio Herba Monstrum Brewery - BIRRERIA ARTIGIANALE CON CUCINA
description:
City: Lecco
description: A well financed brewpub in traditional style with murals on the wall, traditional beams and tables. Seems to be plenty of reason to check this one out. (Added May 2025)

name: Antica Mescita Origini Vineria_Enobottega
description:
City: Pavia
description: Superb-looking compact, traditional beer & wine evening hangout spot with an informal look to it. Excellent reviews. (added May 2025)

name: Birra Del Parco
description:
City: Abbiategrasso
description: Beer specialists in a warm, homely and compact tavern. Organic and unusual beers with locally sourced produce for food. (Added May 2025)

name: Restaurace a Pension U Urbanů
description:
City: Ivančice
description: A possible diamond in the rough, a densely decorated, wood panelled pub with lamps and bric-a-brac. (Added May 2025)

name: Hospoda na Vodárně "MAŠINHÓZ"
description:
City: Moravské Bránice
description: Pub set in an old waterworks, still with its original pumps and works on display inside the pub! Look very carefully at the opening hours on the website before visiting as it does not remain constant week by week. Most of the rooms with the waterworks need to be requested and are not normally open unless it is very busy. (Added 2025)

name: Hospoda Vechtrovna
description:
City: Troubsko,
description: Really nice looking station pub, minimalist but with some well chosen retro touches, a working stove in winter, Dalesice on tap. Directly overlooking the tracks. Seems worth a try. (added May 2025)
